p: Although various pharmacological activities of α-Cyperone against mammalian cells are known [ 18, 19], the antifungal and anticapsular activities of α-Cyperone against fungal pathogens Candida and Cryptococcus species are unknown. In this study, we investigated the antifungal activity of α-Cyperone against various human fungal pathogens, its antifungal synergistic activity, and the anticapsular activity of α-Cyperone on Cryp. neoformans.
